## Desert Ecology Community Assembly (DECA) mirlyn rarefaction 

Due to high variance in the library sizes, it's wise to perform repeated rarefactions before calculating diversity statistics. 

```{r import}
#import data
ps <- t(readRDS('data/16Sdada2/phyloseq_dada2.rds'))
otu <- otu_table(ps, taxa_are_rows = F)
meta <- data.frame(sample_data(ps))
psdf <- phyloseq_to_df(t(ps))



```
